title: Apex Legends Voice Actor Ben Prendergast on the Future of Gaming
description: Voice actor Ben Prendergast, who's voiced characters in games like Apex Legends and God of War Ragnarok, shares his opinions on the tech space's history of "bubbles" and whether blockchain gaming has a future.

title: Nvidia CEO bullish on the future of AI as Q2 revenue skyrockets
description: Computer chip manufacturer Nvidia has experienced a remarkable surge in its stock value, with shares soaring by nearly 10% during after-hours trading. title: SEC charges former corrections officer with crypto fraud
description: A former lieutenant at the New Jersey Department of Corrections, John A. DeSalvo, is facing charges by the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) for allegedly orchestrating a cryptocurrency scam with a specific focus on police officers and first responders. title: Arbitrum Price Prediction 2023 – 2032: Can ARB Reach $100?
description: Arbitrum Price Prediction 2023 – 2032 As the world anticipates improvements, a third alternative has emerged: scaling solutions. title: Hoskinson: SEC Suit Mentioning ADA Is Political, Not Securities Laws
description:
In a recent interview, Cardano founder Charles Hoskinson clarified that the U.S. regulator has not directly targeted Cardano. Hoskinson’s view comes amid a recent Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) lawsuit. In particular, the SEC filed a lawsuit against prominent exchanges Binance and Coinbase in June. The regulator alleged that the exchanges offered trading support for […]

The post Hoskinson: SEC Suit Mentioning ADA Is Political, Not Securities Laws appeared first on Coin Edition.
